ygData.subject: Velious Items: Where do they come from?
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently was in EC and i had been tryin so hard to get my stuff from cazic for my darkforge armor so i took a break. Sitting there i saw an auction for an SK
ygData.messageBody:
I recently was in EC and i had been tryin so hard
to get my stuff from cazic for my darkforge armor so
i took a break. Sitting there i saw an auction for
an SK only helm "Sentient Helm" 14ac 7int 10mana 5
SvM, so i asked what is the price on the helm, he said
300pp my jaw drooped. How could it sell that low, I
thought, then i snapped out of it and bought the dern
thing. Well i have learned there is a whole suit of this
"Sentient Armor." It drops some whenre in velious but
where? If any one knows plz post or send me an email
this is BETTER than DF armor. I highly recomend it.
<br><br>Thx all <br>Cireno De'Tenebrae<br>Loyal Knight of
Innorukk<br>of the 28th season<br><br><br>(forgive me for my
grammatical and spelling errors im about to pass
outttttttttttttttttttttttt
